description:
Chains break, chains stretch, but chains are also easy to replace. This NX chain will get you and your 12-speed drivetrain shifting smoothly and back out on the train in no time.

  • Flatter plate results in noise reduction, more consistent chain riveting and greater strength
  • Chain links feature smooth radius and no chamfers for reduced friction and wear
  • Eagle Powerlock chain connector improves chain guiding and longevity
  • Durable solid pins
name: SRAM NX Eagle 12 Speed Chain
